pkgmetadata.longdescription: Bayesian Mixture Survival Models using Additive Mixture-of- Weibull Hazards, with Lasso Shrinkage and Stratification // Bayesian Mixture Survival Models using Additive Mixture-of- Weibull Hazards, with Lasso Shrinkage and Stratification. As a Bayesian dynamic survival model, it relaxes the proportional- hazard assumption. Lasso shrinkage controls overfitting, given the increase in the number of free parameters in the model due to presence of two Weibull components in the hazard function.
